title: On The Debate on Friday: Matt Le Tissier and Andy Townsend
description: The Debate is back with another selection of guests ready to dissect the big football talking points.
content: David Prutton oversees proceedings on Friday, as Matt Le Tissier and Andy Townsend drop in to look ahead to the weekend's action.Don't miss The Debate from 10.15pm on Sky Sports Premier League.
dbpedia: David Prutton oversees proceedings on Friday, as Matt Le Tissier and Andy Townsend drop in to look ahead to the weekend\'s action.Don\'t miss The Debate from 10.15pm on Sky Sports Premier League.
